synopsis.text: Magical adventures unfold in the life of Yumi Hanazono, a flower-loving girl with a knack for drawing. When two enchanting flower fairies, Kakimaru and Keshimaru, witness Yumi's genuine affection for flowers, they bestow upon her a magical cane and pendant that bring her drawings to life. However, the magic lasts only for a limited time before it vanishes into thin air. As Yumi navigates through her daily challenges, she must learn to wield her newfound powers responsibly, even when her hasty and goofy nature often leads to unexpected consequences. Join Yumi on her thrilling journey as she discovers the true potential of her magical abilities while keeping her secret safe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
